Title: Redfield Weather
Description: Website for weather using weather undergound and silverlight controls.  Used on www.redfieldweather.com
HomeWiki:
Redfield Weather
Website for weather using weather undergound and silverlight controls.


This is the code I have used for my personal weather website.  This code will currently support any Personal Weather Station data from Weather Underground www.weatherunderground.com

I am open to any comments and suggestion people have.  The Silverlight code is rough as this was my first attempt at Silverlight.  If you want to view this code in action you can visit my website www.redfieldweather.com also please feel free to comment abou this on my blog at www.kd8fwv.com

I hope you enjoy.
